content:
Prev: Aaron finds the Philosopher's Stone Up: Timothy's Harry Potter 7th Birthday Party Next: Timothy becomes Fluffy's next target

Fluffy Tag



The three people who are "Fluffy" link arms and try to tag everyone else. Once three people are tagged, they become the new Fluffy. Here Parker, Han-lin, and Tayo chase Ethan, Conner, and Taavi.
Taken Sunday, February 26, 2006, 03:29:27PM. Original image size: 3072x2048, 1.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/320s @ F10.0, ISO 200, 50mm/F1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS7 CRW Daylight, 0:3:50:50:0:25:25
